3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D depth and wall thickness representation. Minimal perspective distortion.

geometric_accuracy.notes: General layout is preserved, but the utility room and bedroom-1 wall depth have been simplified/merged. The balcony is rendered as a low-walled extension.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture represents 2D plan types well, though the kitchen counter has flipped to the opposite wall (window side) compared to the plan.

visual_clarity.notes: High clarity and clean rendering. No text contamination.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen counter is mirrored/placed on the window wall instead of the top wall as shown in the 2D plan.
Utility room and toilet wall configuration simplified, losing the exact notch geometry of the original plan.

summary: A clean and accurate 3D transformation that preserves the primary room logic, though it deviates slightly on specific kitchen and utility room wall details.
